Collection.description: A meticulously curated collection of lamps, lovingly gathered from around the world, each possessing its own story and aesthetic allure.

lamps.name: Vintage Brass Desk Lamp
lamps.notes: Purchased from an antique market in Paris. Features intricate filigree details and a swivel head for adjustable lighting. This lamp belonged to a Parisian artisan who used it to illuminate his workshop during the early 20th century, adding a touch of history and character to its charm.

lamps.name: Modern Glass Pendant Lamp
lamps.notes: Sleek and minimalist design, perfect for illuminating dining areas or kitchen islands. Handcrafted by artisans in Murano, Italy, renowned for their exquisite glasswork. Each lamp is unique, with slight variations in shape and texture, adding an artisanal touch to modern interiors.

lamps.name: Art Deco Floor Lamp
lamps.notes: Elegant and sophisticated design inspired by the Art Deco era. Crafted by master metalworkers in Paris, France, known for their meticulous attention to detail and timeless craftsmanship. This lamp was once displayed in the lobby of a luxury hotel in Paris, exuding glamour and opulence, and now serves as a statement piece in your collection.
